title: Configure a single firewall utility
description: CIS Ubuntu Linux 24.04 LTS Benchmark - Section 4.1: Configure a single firewall utility

controls.title: Ensure a single firewall configuration utility is in use
controls.description: On Ubuntu, ufw, nftables, and iptables are all available. Either ufw or nftables should be used to configure a firewall.
controls.impact: Running multiple firewall utilities concurrently may lead to conflict, therefore only one should be used and configured.
controls.remediation: Configure either ufw or nftables to be the firewall utility in use on the system.
